name: Spirit of Buffalo
description: I am Matteo Cerri I am a Graphic Designer and Illustrator. I was born in Italy in 1991 in a town close to Milan. Growing up, I was always passionate about art, especially interested in creating. My father was a Journalist and Graphic Designer, and thanks to him, I have started drawing and develop an artistic sense from a young age. I got into tribal masks during art lessons in high school, I was so fascinated by cubist artists like Picasso and how he explored the African style.
